author: {\'S}piewak, Mateusz and Biernacka, El{\.z}bieta K and Ma{\l}ek, {\L}ukasz A and Petryka, Joanna and Kowalski, Miros{\l}aw and Mi{\l}osz, Barbara and {\.Z}abicka, Magdalena and Mi{\'s}ko, Jolanta and Ru{\.z}y{\l}{\l}o, Witold
title: Right ventricular outflow tract obstruction as a confounding factor in the assessment of the impact of pulmonary regurgitation on the right ventricular size and function in patients after repair of tetralogy of Fallot
